mapper.select: SELECT * FROM stock sk WHERE sk.sk_shopid = #{skShopid} AND sk.sp_Warehouse_id = #{spWarehouseId} AND sk.sp_storefront_id = #{spStorefrontId}

SELECT s.`sp_shopid`,s.`sp_name`,s.`sp_Company`,s.`sp_Specifications`,s.`sp_color`,s.`sp_jprice`,s.sp_Preset_price,sk.`sk_number`,s.`sp_Manufacturer`,s.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sp_bar_code` FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_type tp ON s.sp_type_id = tp.sp_type_id LEFT JOIN stock sk ON s.sp_shopid = sk.sk_shopid
tp.sp_type_id = #{value}

SELECT s.`sp_shopid`,s.`sp_name`,s.`sp_Company`,s.`sp_Specifications`,s.`sp_color`,s.`sp_jprice`,s.sp_Preset_price,sk.`sk_number`,s.`sp_Manufacturer`,s.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sp_bar_code` FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_type tp ON s.sp_type_id = tp.sp_type_id LEFT JOIN stock sk ON s.sp_shopid = sk.sk_shopid
and s.sp_shopid like concat('%',#{nameandid},'%') or s.sp_name like concat('%',#{nameandid},'%')

SELECT ws.wname, s.`sp_shopid`, s.`sp_name`,s.`sp_Company`,s.`sp_Specifications`, s.`sp_color`,s.`sp_jprice`,SUM(sk.`sk_number`) AS sk_number,s.`sp_Manufacturer`, s.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sp_bar_code`,tp.sp_type_name,s.sp_Preset_price,b.`branchname`,sk.sp_number,sk.sk_number FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_type tp ON s.sp_type_id = tp.sp_type_id LEFT JOIN stock sk ON s.sp_shopid = sk.sk_shopid AND s.Warehouse_id = sk.sp_Warehouse_id LEFT JOIN `warehouse` ws ON ws.`wid` = s.`Warehouse_id` LEFT JOIN supplier sl ON sl.supplierid = s.s_id LEFT JOIN `branch` b ON b.`branchid` =sk.sp_storefront_id
where sk.sk_number <= sk.sp_number GROUP BY s.`sp_shopid`,s.`s_id` ORDER BY s.`sp_shopid`

SELECT p.`sp_shopid`,p.`sp_name`,p.`sp_state`,p.`sp_bar_code`,p.`sp_Company`,p.`sp_Specifications`,p.`sp_Preset_price`,p.`sp_jprice` ,p.`sp_Manufacturer`,p.`sp_color`,p.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sk_number` ,st.`sp_type_name` FROM stock s LEFT JOIN shop p ON s.`sk_shopid`=p.`sp_shopid` LEFT JOIN shop_type st ON st.`sp_type_id` = p.`sp_type_id`

and p.sp_shopid like concat('%',#{testkike},'%') or p.sp_name like concat('%',#{testkike},'%')

SELECT s.`sk_number`,s.`sp_number`,sp.`sp_shopid`,sp.`sp_name`,sp.`sp_Company`,sp.`sp_Specifications` ,sp.`sp_color`, bc.`branchname`,ws.`wname` FROM stock s LEFT JOIN shop sp ON s.`sk_shopid` = sp.`sp_shopid` LEFT JOIN branch bc ON bc.`branchid` = s.`sp_storefront_id` LEFT JOIN warehouse ws ON ws.`wid` = s.`sp_Warehouse_id`

SELECT ws.wid,ws.wname,sl.suppliername,sk.sp_Warehouse_id, s.`sp_shopid`, s.`sp_name`,s.`sp_Company`,s.`sp_Specifications`, s.`sp_color`,s.`sp_jprice`,SUM(sk.`sk_number`) AS sk_number,s.`sp_Manufacturer`, s.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sp_bar_code`,tp.sp_type_name,s.sp_Preset_price,b.`branchname` FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_type tp ON s.sp_type_id = tp.sp_type_id LEFT JOIN stock sk ON s.sp_shopid = sk.sk_shopid AND s.Warehouse_id = sk.sp_Warehouse_id LEFT JOIN `warehouse` ws ON ws.`wid` = s.`Warehouse_id` LEFT JOIN supplier sl ON sl.supplierid = s.s_id LEFT JOIN `branch` b ON b.`branchid` =sk.sp_storefront_id WHERE b.branchid=#{param1} AND ws.wid=#{param2} AND tp.sp_type_id=#{param3} GROUP BY s.`sp_shopid`,s.`s_id` ORDER BY s.`sp_shopid`

SELECT ws.wname, s.`sp_shopid`, s.`sp_name`,s.`sp_Company`,s.`sp_Specifications`, s.`sp_color`,s.`sp_jprice`,SUM(sk.`sk_number`) AS sk_number,s.`sp_Manufacturer`, s.`sp_beizhu`,s.`sp_bar_code`,tp.sp_type_name,s.sp_Preset_price,b.`branchname`,sk.sp_number,sk.sk_number FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_type tp ON s.sp_type_id = tp.sp_type_id LEFT JOIN stock sk ON s.sp_shopid = sk.sk_shopid AND s.Warehouse_id = sk.sp_Warehouse_id LEFT JOIN `warehouse` ws ON ws.`wid` = s.`Warehouse_id` LEFT JOIN supplier sl ON sl.supplierid = s.s_id LEFT JOIN `branch` b ON b.`branchid` =sk.sp_storefront_id WHERE b.branchid =#{param1} AND ws.wid=#{param2} AND tp.sp_type_id=#{param3} AND sk.sk_number <= sk.sp_number GROUP BY s.`sp_shopid`,s.`s_id` ORDER BY s.`sp_shopid`

SELECT s.`sk_number`,s.`sp_number`,sp.`sp_shopid`,sp.`sp_name`,sp.`sp_Company`,sp.`sp_Specifications` ,sp.`sp_color`, bc.`branchname`,ws.`wname`,sp_type_name,s.sp_number FROM stock s LEFT JOIN shop sp ON s.`sk_shopid` = sp.`sp_shopid` LEFT JOIN branch bc ON bc.`branchid` = s.`sp_storefront_id` LEFT JOIN warehouse ws ON ws.`wid` = s.`sp_Warehouse_id` LEFT JOIN shop_type st ON st.sp_type_id=sp.sp_type_id where st.sp_type_id=#{param1}
